# Description: src/infrastructure/storage/cache/kv_cache_manager.py

Module docstring (if present):

    KV Cache Manager.

    GPU/CPU KV cache orchestration for transformer inference:
    - Paged attention memory layout
    - Block allocation and defragmentation
    - CPU-GPU tensor transfers

    Inspired by vLLM's v1/core/kv_cache_manager.py architecture.

- Classes: DeviceType, DType, KVCacheConfig, KVCacheBlock, KVCacheBlocks, KVCacheAllocator, PagedKVCache, KVCacheTransfer, KVCacheManager
- Functions: create_kv_cache_manager
